Message:
Our creation was draped
in two colors of light.

It was a magic sword,
and the spirits of
Artie and me made it
shine brilliantly...

We quickly made our way
to the ruins of the battlefield
where the evil sword was
rumored to be.

When we saw the crater,
and smelled
the stench of death,

Its ominous glow
looked as though
it was swarming with
the regrets of every victim
it had claimed...

Artie took my hand
into her own.

The sound of
her warm heartbeat
begins to drown out
my fear and anxiety.

That’s right.
The two of us are one.
